name: Six Thinking Hats
shortDescription: Structured thinking using six different perspectives

steps.name: White Hat - Facts and information
steps.description: Focus on objective facts, data, and information without interpretation

steps.name: Red Hat - Emotions and feelings
steps.description:

steps.description:

steps.name: Yellow Hat - Positive thinking and optimism
steps.description: Focus on benefits, value, and optimistic possibilities

steps.name: Green Hat - Creative thinking and alternatives
steps.description:
Generate new ideas, alternatives, and creative solutions

steps.name: Blue Hat - Process control and meta-thinking
steps.description: Manage thinking process, set goals, and orchestrate other perspectives
